layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x31
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x31
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (0,0) size 800x30 [bgcolor=#000000]
      LayoutBlockFlow {A} at (0,0) size 800x30 [color=#0000EE] [bgcolor=#FF0000]
        LayoutText {#text} at (10,5) size 39x19
          text run at (10,5) width 39: "Home"
layer at (55,190) size 50x50
  LayoutBlockFlow (positioned) {IMG} at (55,190) size 50x50
    LayoutBlockFlow {SPAN} at (0,0) size 50x50 [border: (1px solid #C0C0C0)]
      LayoutImage (floating) {IMG} at (2,2) size 16x16
      LayoutInline {SPAN} at (0,0) size 0x0
